text.content:
INITIAL NUTRITION ASSESSMENT 

Comprehensive nutrition assessment note

**ASSESSMENT

-Pertinent Client History: 
RD consult for "Veteran states he has lost 8-10 lbs. in the past month.  States 
it was due to "just not eating."

Medical history - "quote from H&P" -H&P (Date)

Pertinent meds include:  xMEDICATIONS:
Active Inpatient and Outpatient Medications (including Supplies):
 
     Inpatient Medications                                  Status
=========================================================================
1)   ASPIRIN TAB,EC  81MG PO QDAY                           ACTIVE
2)   CALCIUM CARBONATE TAB  500 MG PO TID                   ACTIVE
3)   CEFUROXIME TAB  500MG PO BID                           ACTIVE
4)   CHLORTHALIDONE TAB  12.5 MG PO QDAY                    ACTIVE
5)   ERGOCALCIFEROL CAP,ORAL  00000UNIT PO QDAY             ACTIVE
6)   GLYBURIDE TAB  2.5MG PO QDAY                           ACTIVE
7)   LEVOTHYROXINE NA (SYNTHROID) TAB  0.125MG PO QDAY      ACTIVE
8)   LISINOPRIL TAB  20MG PO QDAY                           ACTIVE
9)   MORPHINE INJ  2MG/0.5ML IV Q4H PRN pain                ACTIVE
10)  NAPROXEN TAB  500MG PO BID for pain                    ACTIVE
11)  SIMVASTATIN TAB  80MG PO QPM                           ACTIVE
12)  VENLAFAXINE CAP,SA  225MG PO DAILY                     ACTIVE
 
     Outpatient Medications                                 Status
=========================================================================
1)   ASPIRIN 81MG EC TAB TAKE ONE TABLET BY MOUTH EVERY     ACTIVE
       DAY
2)   CALCIUM CARBONATE 1.25GM (CA 500MG) TAB TAKE 500 MG    ACTIVE
       BY MOUTH THREE TIMES A DAY
3)   CEFUROXIME AXETIL 500MG TAB TAKE ONE TABLET BY MOUTH   ACTIVE
       TWICE A DAY
4)   CHLORTHALIDONE 25MG TAB TAKE ONE TABLET BY MOUTH       ACTIVE
       EVERY DAY
5)   ERGOCALCIFEROL 1000 UNIT CAP TAKE 1000 UNITS           ACTIVE
       CAPSULE(S) BY MOUTH EVERY DAY
6)   GLYBURIDE 2.5MG TAB TAKE ONE TABLET BY MOUTH EVERY     ACTIVE
       DAY
7)   LEVOTHYROXINE NA (SYNTHROID) 0.125MG TAB TAKE ONE      ACTIVE
       TABLET BY MOUTH EVERY DAY
8)   LISINOPRIL 20MG TAB TAKE ONE TABLET BY MOUTH EVERY     ACTIVE
       DAY
9)   NAPROXEN 500MG TAB TAKE ONE TABLET BY MOUTH TWICE A    ACTIVE
       DAY FOR PAIN
10)  SIMVASTATIN 80MG TAB TAKE ONE TABLET BY MOUTH EVERY    ACTIVE
       EVENING
11)  VENLAFAXINE HCL 75MG SA CAP TAKE THREE CAPSULES BY     ACTIVE
       MOUTH DAILY
 
23 Total Medications

ALLERGIES/ADRS:
METFORMIN, CITALOPRAM, FLUOXETINE


-Food Nutrition History: 
Food allergies: none
Chewing/swallowing problems: none
N/v/c/d: none
Diet: REGULAR
During last admission pt was eating adequately See Nutrition note 12/14/12. Pt 
reported not eating, which was likely d/t phychological reasons. Now that pt is 
again admitted expect intake to improve. Pt reports good appetite today. Food 
preferences discussed.

-Pertinent Laboratory Data and/or Tests: 
07/09/13 10:49    POTASSIUM            3.8
07/09/13 10:49    SODIUM               139
07/09/13 10:49    CREATININE           0.8
07/09/13 10:49    UREA NITROGEN        8
07/09/13 10:48    FINGERSTICK GLUCOS   142H
07/09/13 10:49    GLUCOSE              144H
07/09/13 10:49    PROTEIN,TOTAL        7.3
07/09/13 10:49    ALBUMIN              3.7L
07/09/13 10:49    TOT. BILIRUBIN       1.0
07/09/13 10:49    ALKALINE PHOSPHATA   176H
07/09/13 10:49    LDH                  73L
07/09/13 10:49    SGOT                 76H
07/09/13 10:49    ALT                  292H
07/09/13 10:49    AMYLASE              43
07/09/13 10:49    LIPASE               122
07/09/13 10:49    ANION GAP            10
07/09/13 10:49    TROPONIN             0.02


-Anthropometric Measurements & Nutrition Focused Physical Findings
Weight:  231 lb [105.0 kg] (07/03/2013 15:13)
Previous Wt: 233
Height:  64 in [162.6 cm] (11/20/2012 16:31)
BMI:  40

VITAL SIGNS:
B/P:  133/77 (07/11/2013 08:30)
Pulse:  76 (07/11/2013 08:30)
Temperature:  98.6 F [37.0 C] (07/11/2013 08:30)
Respirations:  16 (07/11/2013 08:30)
Pain:  0 (07/11/2013 08:30)

 

IBW: 140 lbs  Hamwi  %IBW: 7777777%  pt appears overweight

-Estimated Daily Nutrient Needs based on current wt
Energy Requirements: 2310 kcal (22 kcal/kg obesity)
Protein Requirements: 84 g  (0.8g/kg maintain)
Fluid Requirements: 2300 ml (1ml/kcal)

-Nutritional Status: normal

**NUTRITION DIAGNOSIS
None at this time

**INTERVENTION 
1.Food and Nutrient Delivery
  -Recommend continue regular diet
  -Food preferences updated in computer
  -Standing Orders for items pt requested inputted 
      w diet pattern adjusted accordingly

3.Nutrition Education
  None pt had no questions 

**OUTCOMES TO MONITOR AND EVALUATE
-weight monthly with goal to prevent gain, or severe loss
-average meal/snack intake to be within 10% of estimated needs monthly 
F/u within 30 days per N&FS SOP
text.author: AVIVAUSER,THIRTY
